alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 21 at 9:34PM MST until September 22 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... The Paria River in... Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 700 AM MST Thursday /800 AM MDT Thursday/. * At 925 PM MST /1025 PM MDT/, gauge reports in Utah indicate another crest of water flowing down the Paria River. Flash flooding is ongoing near Less Ferry with a 4 foot rise observed around 800 PM MST. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding in the Paria River. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of the Paria River. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding in the Paria include...Lees Ferry, Glen Canyon National Recreation Area, Grand Canyon National Park and Navajo Reservation. This includes the following slot canyons... Paria River upstream of Lees Ferry. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Paria River and Colorado River. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Get out of the Paria River slot canyon! Flood waters are flowing down the Paria River and into the Colorado River at Lees Ferry.
